description: A response from the JetStream $JS.API.CONSUMER.PAUSE API
title: io.nats.jetstream.api.v1.consumer_pause_response

paused.description: Indicates if after parsing the pause_until property if the consumer was paused

pause_until.description: The deadline till the consumer will be unpaused, only usable if 'paused' is true

pause_remaining.description: When paused the time remaining until unpause
